candidates.title: Replace deprecated methods in actix_files
candidates.body: Apply suggested changes by deprecation warnings

candidates.title: Remove byteorder-dependency
candidates.body:
This removes the `byteorder`-dependency from the `web`-component, replacing it with the `stdlib`-implementations that were stabilized in 1.32 and 1.34. Dropping a dependency is worth the change IMHO.

Notice that the calls to `.unwrap()` do not change previous behavior regarding panics.

candidates.title: add rustls support for actix-http and awc
Update the copyless version to 0.1.4
candidates.body: < 0.1.4 failed to check for null when doing allocations which could lead to null dereferences.

candidates.title: Bump derive_more crate version to 0.15.0 in actix-cors
Use encoding_rs crate instead of unmaintained encoding crate
updated actix-session to support login and logout functionality
candidates.body:
To see the impact of these changes, see [main.rs in this repo](https://github.com/Dowwie/actix_session_test/blob/master/src/main.rs).

Specifically:
- L38:  invoke session.renew() at successful login
- L45:  session.purge() at logout

candidates.title: Remove ring subsubdependency when using actix-files.
candidates.body: This is basically the same PR as #895 but for actix-files rather than actix-multipart.

candidates.title: Remove ring subsubdependency when using actix-multipart.
candidates.body:
This is related to #741. 

Setting the default features to false seems like an anti-pattern but it doesn't seem to be a feature to [disable single features in cargo](rust-lang/cargo#3126) yet.

candidates.title: web-codegen: Add extra-traits to syn features
candidates.body:
```rust
error[E0277]: `syn::attr::NestedMeta` doesn't implement `std::fmt::Debug`
   --> src/route.rs:149:57
    |
149 |                 attr => panic!("Unknown attribute{:?}", attr),
    |                                                         ^^^^ `syn::attr::NestedMeta` cannot be formatted using `{:?}` because it doesn't implement `std::fmt::Debug`
    |
    = help: the trait `std::fmt::Debug` is not implemented for `syn::attr::NestedMeta`
    = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `std::fmt::Debug` for `&syn::attr::NestedMeta`
    = note: required by `std::fmt::Debug::fmt`
```

candidates.title: replate `time::Duration` with `chrono::Duration` and add `max_age_time` method
candidates.body: as #785 says, I replate it and add two more tests for cookies' max-age

candidates.title: Expand codegen to allow specify guards and async
candidates.body:
Route's attributes:

- `"path"` - Raw literal string with path for which to register handler
- `async` - Attribute to indicate that registered function is asynchronous.
- `guard="function_name"` - Registers function as guard using `actix_web::guard::fn_guard`

If resource type is not specified, attempts to infer it based on return type (if it fails, assume regular function)

repo.name: actix-web
repo.description: Actix Web is a powerful, pragmatic, and extremely fast web framework for Rust.
